code: import React,{useState,useContext,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{AuthContext}from'../../context/AuthContext';import'./LoginForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function LoginForm(){const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const inputRef=useRef();const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{if(inputRef.current)inputRef.current.focus();},[]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!username||!password){alert('Please, fill all fields');return;}login(username,password);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login_form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"login_title",children:"Log in to your account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),ref:inputRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:'Login',onClick:handleSubmit})]});}
